title: Victoria Southeastern Suburbs Escape with Mediterranean-Inspired Lounge & Eatery
description: Discover Victoria's vibrant southeastern suburbs when you stay at Holiday Inn Dandenong, an IHG Hotel. Spend quiet moments enjoying a Mediterranean-inspired meal and refreshing drink at the Dandelion Lounge and Eatery (fresh pasta or woodfired pizza, anyone?) or venture outside to explore the smorgasbord of culturally diverse food options on your doorstep. While you're here, be sure to test out the 24-hour gym and work up a sweat treadmill, bike and elliptical cross trainer.
location_description: Holiday Inn Dandenong, an IHG Hotel
